name: Modules.Map.Circle
summary: Represents a bounded area on the map.

properties.name: center
properties.summary: An object with longitude and latitude values. Can also be an array with longitude (index 0), latitude (index 1) touples.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.summary: Color to use when shading the circle, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description: For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: opacity
properties.summary: Opacity of this map circle, from 0.0 (transparent) to 1.0 (opaque).

properties.name: radius
properties.summary: The radius of the circle, specified in meters. It should be zero or greater.

properties.name: strokeColor
properties.summary: Color to use for the border of the circle, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description: For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: strokeWidth
properties.summary: Line width in pixels to use when drawing the circle.

properties.name: touchEnabled
properties.summary: Determines whether view should receive touch events.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.summary: The order (depth) in which to display the circles.
properties.description: For iOS, the circles are drawn in the order in which they are added.
